attributes.action: Ban fireworks that make a noise. Silent fireworks only by law.
attributes.background: No one needs to terrify animals and kill wildlife to enjoy fireworks.  So all fireworks should be silent.

rejection.details:
All fireworks make a noise, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900
